oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sabbath Day Church of God in Christ, 2001 December
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Sabbath Day Church of God in Christ located at 902 Eleventh Avenue North in Nashville, Tennessee. According to the cornerstone the structure was built in 1901 as Hill Lodge. The foundation is made of rough cut stone blocks. The exterior walls are brick. The roof is gabled and composed of tar shingles. The windows are clear glass and frosted glass. The doors are metal. A small concrete block addition is located at the rear of the church. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hill Lodge (Nashville, Tenn.); Sabbath Day Church of God in Christ (Nashville, Tenn.)
